about_the_game:
The gods, timeless entities wielding immeasurable might, have observed with growing dismay the unyielding devastation wrought by humanity upon the natural world. In a decisive response, they unveil a formidable ultimatum: a ruthless, unforgiving arena where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance. Here, humans must engage in a desperate struggle for survival, battling against overwhelming odds, or succumb to the looming shadow of extinction. This arena is not just a test of strength and endurance; it's a crucible where the very essence of human resilience and ingenuity is put to the ultimate test.
Features
  • Auto fight weapons and skill
  • Lots of characters ready to play
  • Receive stat upgrades when leveling up
  • Fight and resist hundreds of thousands of monsters
  • Pick up exp stones to level up and use them to buy equipment in the store
  • Even if you lose, you always get something; the power stones will help you become stronger.
  • Fighting style is decided by the player, with no limitations on weapon selection or skills

name: Fight To The Death Demo
short_description: Fight and survive in an arena filled with monsters from many different civilizations. Receive power from the gods and use each character's unique fighting style to survive.
